testcase.brief: Verify read-only user can execute all kinds of show commands
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Create a read-only user in AP
Test Procedure: 1. Read-only user login AP 2. Execute all kinds of show commands

step.desc: Create a read-only user in AP
Read-only user login AP Execute all kinds of show commands
step.telnet: -v "show interface" -v "show interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "show admin" -v "show admin active" -v "show ssid" -v "show hive" -v "show amrp neighbor" -v "show dns" -v "show ntp" -v "show logging" -v "show system led" -v "show capwap client "
